onDeviceFound

private void onDeviceFound(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device)
Called when a device is found. Adds the name and address of the found device to the lists of names/addresses found during this scan.

Parameters:
device - the BluetoothDevice that was found.

onPluginStart

protected void onPluginStart()
Description copied from class: InputPlugin
Called when this InputPlugin is started. This method is meant to be overridden.

Specified by:
onPluginStart in class InputPlugin

onPluginStop

protected void onPluginStop()
Stops the plugin, interrupts the execution thread, unregisters all broadcast receivers and cancels any ongoing discoveries. Disables Bluetooth adapter if it was disabled when the service was started.

Specified by:
onPluginStop in class InputPlugin
